page.title: 08THE BODY STUDIO S.CROYDON
page.content: The Body Studio was opened in 1981 to provide {fitness classes}mainly for women,though there are mixed classes available.Ages range from 10 _ 40.There are many different exercises for each type of person.Classes last for 75 _ 90 mins.with 15 _ 20 people on average.Most peple come in the evenings.Women like to look good so there is a{beauty}parlour,boutique and massage parlour.Clothes are important as comfortable clothing helps people move freely.Tracksuits and leotards are ideal.The exercising takes place in a large room on soft mats,working to the latest pop music.This is a good place not only for{health}but also for {leisure}and is typical of the 1980's health conscious attitudes of people.
